General_Description: '''Fire in the Belly''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Travel west toward a large burned [[Temple of Athena Itonia|temple]] in the [[Mount Helikon]] region. You'll find me inside, at the source of the fire!''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_Trivia: *Fire in the belly is an idiomatic phrase referring to emotional stamina and vigor, passion, or inner drive to achieve something.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
